description:
Demolition of existing building and erection of three blocks comprising an eight storey building, a part two/part three/part seven storey building and a five storey building to provide a replacement gym (Use Class E (d)) and 81 affordable residential units (Use Class C3).  Proposal to include associated landscape improvements, cycle parking, car parking and refuse storage.

This application affects the setting of the following listed buildings:- Coronation Cinema now Snooker Hall (Grade II) and Earl of Essex Public House (Grade II).
